name: Green Spaces
description: Green spaces, parks, scrubs, playing fields, etc.
query:
SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon where amenity IN ('park','gardens',
  'square', 'green', 'garden') OR leisure IN ('park', 'open_space', 'recreation_ground', 'sports_ground',
  'dog_park', 'sports_ground', 'scrub', 'common', 'stadium', 'golf_course', 'nature_reserve')
  OR (leisure='sports_centre' and building is null or building='no') OR landuse IN ('forest',
  'conservation', 'cemetery', 'recreation_ground', 'farmland')
  OR "natural"='wood'
